description:
It`s the Annual Cherry Festival at St. Cherine`s, and a hectic one for Haruka and friends. In their civilian IDs, they`re running a maid cafe for their classroom... while as Twin Angel, they have to face a new menace: the Angel-hating Twin Phantom!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kyouteki Shutsugen! Twin Phantom wa Dare?
強敵出現! ツインファントムは誰?
